name: Kiki and the pumpklings
description:
My first game for my first Jam ever,  I'm new to gamedev and programming so are some things I couldn't figured out, but it's playable and enjoyable. I hope you guys like it as well.

Play as Kiki, a little girl who finds a living pumpkin and ventures through 5 levels to descover the truth. 

Move: arrow keys

Tap "z" to do a short jump, hold it to jump higher.
